name: MarioTown Rewritten
description: This is my ToonTown Fangame that was simply a multiplayer game which is on 3D and 2D. It's called MarioTown Rewritten. In this game. You have Laff Points if you did it and save MarioTown. If you don't have Laff Points? You will give up! But Don't worry! You need a username in the fangame installer and try to make a character.
